20101202220756.000|20101202220758.000|CCO|IN THE U.S. MILITARY.

20101202220800.000|20101202220802.000|CCO|PENTAGON OFFICIALS DEFENDED THE 
20101202220802.000|20101202220804.000|CCO|REPORT VERY STRONGLY AND ALSO

20101202220812.000|20101202220814.000|CCO|SOLDIERS AND MARINES MAY WANT 
20101202220814.000|20101202220816.000|CCO|SEPARATE SHOWER FACILITIES.

20101202220818.000|20101202220820.000|CCO|SOME MAY QUIT THE SERVICE.

20101202220822.000|20101202220825.333|CCO|BUT I BELIEVE AND HISTORY TELLS

20101202225849.143|20101202225850.571|CCO|REPRESENTATIVES IN A VOTE TO SEE

20101202225854.000|20101202225856.000|CCO|THEY SAID NO, IT DID NOT GET A 
20101202225856.000|20101202225858.000|CCO|MAJORITY VOTE, AND HE WAS

20101202225900.000|20101202225902.000|CCO|RECOMMENDATIONS OF THE ETHICS 
20101202225902.000|20101202225903.667|CCO|COMMITTEE AND THAT IS A 
20101202225903.667|20101202225905.333|CCO|BIPARTISAN COMMITTEE VOTING 9-1,
20101202225905.333|20101202225907.000|CCO|TO BE CENSURED BY THE HOUSE OF 
20101202225907.000|20101202225908.667|CCO|REPRESENTATIVES.
20101202225908.667|20101202225910.333|CCO|HE IS 80 YEARS OLD AND 20 TERMS 
20101202225910.333|20101202225912.000|CCO|IN CONGRESS AND THIS IS THE 
20101202225912.000|20101202225913.667|CCO|TWILIGHT OF THE CAREER, AND THIS
20101202225913.667|20101202225915.333|CCO|IS ONE OF THE LAST CHAPTERS AND 
20101202225915.333|20101202225917.000|CCO|EVEN FOR PEOPLE WHO VOTED TO 
20101202225917.000|20101202225918.667|CCO|CENSURE CHARLES RANGEL, IT IS 
20101202225918.667|20101202225920.333|CCO|SOMETHING THAT IS SAD FOR THEM 
20101202225920.333|20101202225922.000|CCO|TO SEE SOMEONE WHO HAS HAD A 
20101202225922.000|20101202225924.500|CCO|CAREER AS HE HAS, AND THIS IS 
20101202225924.500|20101202225927.000|CCO|REALLY GOING TO BE ONE OF THE 
20101202225927.000|20101202225929.500|CCO|LAST PARTS OF HIS CAREER, WOLF. 
20101202225929.500|20101202225932.000|CCO|>> VERY SAD FOR A LOT OF FOLKS 
20101202225932.000|20101202225933.250|CCO| 
20101202225933.250|20101202225934.500|CCO|TO SEE IT, ESPECIALLY DONNA
